ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Imbrued gloves?
ygData.msgSnippet: Nah, get Guantlets of Fiery Might instead :)  AC 10 +7 str/sta/dex +7 poison/disease resist. ... From: Garramone, Michael (CCI-Las Vegas)
ygData.messageBody:
Nah, get Guantlets of Fiery Might instead :) AC 10 +7 str/sta/dex +7
poison/disease resist.

-----Original Message-----
From: Garramone, Michael (CCI-Las Vegas)
[mailto:garramone@...]
Sent: Wednesday, March 08, 2000 7:32 AM
To: 'eqbards@onelist.com'
Subject: RE: [eqbards] Imbrued gloves?


From: "Garramone, Michael (CCI-Las Vegas)" <garramone@...>

they have 2 things going for them: Looks and AC/HP (the current rage), so i
wear em.

Shada Powa, L50 Wood Elf Bard
Tyria Sarkin, L45 High Elf Wizard
<Afterlife> Mithaniel Marr Server


> From: M Sanford <pr0teus@...>
>
> They sucked before and they suck now.
> AC 12, 5 wis, 5 dex, 10 hp.
> Slighty better than lambent I guess (exchange 10 hp for 1 cha), but
> hardly the caliber of a plane item.
>
> Maev Lorekeeper
> Tarew Marr
